channel.title: Blog on Jakub's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Jakub's Blog

item.title: Creating a Blog
item.description: I have been experimenting with a lot of different blog engines or static generation engines, but I for quite some time I couldn’t get myself to get into writting a blog. It seemed that quite often either the idea of setting up the static site generator was more distracting than writing the blog itself. Nedless to say, I repeatedly failed over and over again to write my own blog.
